faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Elevo
faq.q1: How does Elevo analyze my videos?
faq.a1: Elevo uses Google Gemini 2.0 Flash to analyze your videos at 5 frames per second (0.2s intervals). It examines visual patterns like scene types, camera motion, text overlays, transitions, and pacing to identify what makes content successful.
faq.q2: Which social media platforms are supported?
faq.a2: Elevo currently supports Instagram (Reels), TikTok, YouTube (Shorts and regular videos), and Facebook (Reels and posts). We connect via official OAuth integrations to ensure secure publishing.
faq.q3: Can Elevo edit my videos automatically?
faq.a3: Yes! Based on the patterns and scripts generated, Elevo can automatically create optimized variations of your videos for different platforms, adjusting duration, aspect ratio, pacing, and adding text overlays.
faq.q4: Is this suitable for small businesses?
faq.a4: Absolutely! Elevo is designed specifically for SMEs who want to create professional social media content without hiring a dedicated marketing team. Our AI handles the complex analysis and optimization.
faq.a5: Yes. We use AES-256 encryption for all OAuth tokens, and your videos are stored securely. We never share your content or data with third parties.
faq.q6: Do I need technical knowledge to use Elevo?
faq.a6: Not at all! Elevo is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. Simply upload your videos, and the AI handles the complex analysis and optimization work for you.
